劍.definition: double-edged sword; CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]; classifier for blows of a sword

劍嘴鶥.definition: (bird species of China) slender-billed scimitar babbler (Pomatorhinus superciliaris)

劍川.definition: Jianchuan county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

劍川縣.definition: Jianchuan county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

劍拔弩張.definition: lit. with swords drawn and bows bent (idiom); fig. a state of mutual hostility; at daggers drawn

劍指.definition: (fig.) to target; to set one's sights on (a goal, problem etc)

劍河.definition: Jianhe county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

劍河縣.definition: Jianhe county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

劍眉星目.definition: (idiom) straight, thick, upward-inclined eyebrows and eyes that are bright and full of spirit; striking, handsome features; dashing, heroic appearance

劍走偏鋒.definition: the sword moves with side stroke (modern idiom); fig. unexpected winning move; unconventional gambit

劍走蜻蛉.definition: the sword moves like a dragon-fly (modern idiom); fig. unexpected winning move; unconventional gambit

劍閣.definition: Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan

劍閣縣.definition: Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan

劍鴴.definition: (bird species of China) common ringed plover (Charadrius hiaticula)
